title: RubyConf 2014 - Ruby Idioms You're Not Using Yet
description:
dioms are some of the smallest patterns that we use in our programming languages. Learning the idioms of a language helps you more quickly understand commonly used patterns. Over time, some idioms fall out of favor, and new idioms are developed and adopted.
In this talk, we'll explore a few idioms that are relatively new to the Ruby community. These include:
Module factory
Tag module
Circuit breaker
Fetch with default block
